summary: An ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 48580, entitled: "An ordinance providing for the laying off, opening, widening, extending and establishing of Lorentz Place, from the south margin of West Wheeler Street to a point approximately two hundred two (202) feet north therefrom; providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor; and providing that the entire cost of said improvement be paid by special assessment upon the property specially benefited in the manner provided by law", approved the 26th day of March, 1925.
